mapper.select: SELECT sg.seq ,mm.id as creator ,sg.group_name ,sg.sports ,sg.location ,sg.people_number ,sg.startTime ,sg.endTime ,sg.detail ,sg.viewCount ,sg.map ,sg.playDate ,upSg.type ,upSg.defaultNY ,upSg.sort ,upSg.originalName ,upSg.uuidName ,upSg.ext ,upSg.size ,upSg.delNY ,upSg.pSeq ,upSg.path FROM sportsGroup sg JOIN member mm ON sg.creator = mm.seq JOIN uploadedSportsGroup upSg ON sg.seq = upSg.pSeq

SELECT sg.seq ,mm.id as creator ,sg.group_name ,sg.sports ,sg.location ,sg.people_number ,sg.startTime ,sg.endTime ,sg.detail ,sg.viewCount ,sg.map ,sg.playDate FROM sportsGroup sg JOIN member mm ON mm.seq = sg.creator WHERE 1=1 AND sg.seq=#{shSeq}
SELECT ccg_seq ,cc_name ,cc_key FROM cc WHERE 1=1 AND ccg_seq = 6
SELECT seq FROM sportsGroup ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1
